title: Solid-phase synthesis of C-terminal thio-linked glycopeptides
abstract: NoA solid-phase Mitsunobu reaction between a resin-bound 1-thiosugar and an N-Fmoc protected amino alcohol was successfully employed for thio-linked glycopeptide synthesis. Facile cleavage and deprotection in one step afforded the target glycopeptide in good yield and purity

A solid-phase Mitsunobu reaction between a resin-bound 1-thiosugar and an N-Fmoc protected amino alcohol was successfully employed for thio-linked glycopeptide synthesis. Facile cleavage and deprotection in one step afforded the target glycopeptide in good yield and purity.</dc:description><dc:date>
